Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Class PayResourceBuyCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.PayResource
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.PayResourceBuyCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PayResourceBuyCard
extends PayResource
PayResourceBuyCard Class extends PayResource Class to diversify messages going to the Client for a better response management.

  • Method Details

    • messagePrepare

      public MessageToClient messagePrepare​(ActionController actionController)
      Prepares a BoughtCardMessage or PaymentMessage MessageToClient type object to be sent to the Client.
      Overrides:
      messagePrepare in class PayResource
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      A BoughtCardMessage if the player finished paying for a Development Card, or a PaymentMessage if the player has not yet finished paying for said card.
